sentences.sentence: A variety of the loosestrife herb.
sentences.translation: 千屈莱科的一种草本植物。

sentences.sentence: But at this moment Winston noticed some tufts of loosestrife growing in the cracks of the cliff beneath them. One tuft was of two colours, magenta and brick-red, apparently growing on the same root.
sentences.translation: 但就在这个时候，温斯顿发现了脚下峭壁缝隙里有几株千屈草，其中一株有两种颜色，洋红色和砖红色，一看就知道是同根生的。
